name: DrHunt'sMindfulMinute
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: At Coppell Independent School District we focus on the social and emotional needs of not only our students but our staff as well. Hear a social and emotional tip from your Superintendent Dr. Brad Hunt.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
